last_episode_to_air.name: Whole New World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Suika attempts to create a revival liquid from scratch. Feeling lonely and anxious, she repeatedly fails, but finally manages to revive Senku!! As she revives her friends from the Kingdom of Science one by one and reunites with them for the first time in seven years, Senku discovers a terrifying secret hidden in the petrification device... And the moon landing plan to uncover Whyman's true identity is restarted, involving the entire world!!

name: Dr. STONE
overview: One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he’s not alone! His science-loving friend Senku’s been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he’s not alone! His science-loving friend Senku’s been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!

seasons.name: Stone Wars
seasons.overview: Armed with the power of science and a genius intellect, Senkuu is determined to save humanity. However, Tsukasa’s empire goes on the offensive to halt the progress of science. Bolder choices are made as these two start a war that rocks the Stone World.

seasons.name: New World
seasons.overview: Senkuu and the Kingdom of Science sail to new lands to uncover more scientific secrets!

seasons.name: Science Future
seasons.overview: After the battle on Treasure Island, Senku and the gang return to the Kingdom of Science. With their sights set on the Moon, they must first voyage to the Americas in hopes of beginning to harvest the required materials. Through teamwork and science, they continue the fight to save humanity once and for all!
